# Rheumatoid Arthritis 2014

**Last updated:** `r Sys.Date()`

**Code version:** `r system("git log -1 --format='%H'", intern = TRUE)`

The GWAS summary statistics corresponding to @ra_nature_2014 are provided by [Dr. Yukinori Okada](http://plaza.umin.ac.jp/yokada/datasource/software.htm).

We only use the [Eurpean GWAS meta-analysis results](http://plaza.umin.ac.jp/yokada/datasource/files/GWASMetaResults/RA_GWASmeta_European_v2.txt.gz) in this section. 

The following analyses have been performed on Rheumatoid Arthritis (RA) 2014 dataset.

- GSEA Round 1 (Section \@ref(ra2014-1))
- GSEA Round 2 (Section \@ref(ra2014-2))
